quote: 選擇一份你熱愛的工作，那麼你一生中就沒有一天是在工作。(Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.)
author: 孔子 (Confucius) (常被如此引用，強調工作與興趣結合)

quote: 成功的關鍵不是資訊，而是專注。(The key to success is not information. It is focus.)
author: 內森·羅斯柴爾德 (Nathan Rothschild) (類似觀點，強調專注力)

quote: 不要等待領導者；自己動手，一個一個地來。(Don't wait for leaders; do it alone, person to person.)
author: 德蕾莎修女 (Mother Teresa)

quote: 如果你想讓事情順利完成，就交給忙碌的人去做。(If you want something done, ask a busy person to do it.)
author: 班傑明·富蘭克林 (Benjamin Franklin) (類似觀點)

quote: 溝通中最重要的事，是聽到沒有說出口的話。(The most important thing in communication is hearing what isn't said.)
author: 彼得·杜拉克 (Peter Drucker)

quote: 努力工作能解決我們90%的問題。(Hard work solves 90% of our problems.)
author: 不詳 (強調努力的重要性)

quote: 唯一能做好工作的辦法是熱愛你所做的事。(The only way to do great work is to love what you do.)
author: 史蒂夫·賈伯斯 (Steve Jobs)

quote: 不要讓昨天占据你太多的今天。(Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.)
author: 威爾·羅傑斯 (Will Rogers)

quote: 機會往往偽裝成辛勤的工作，所以大多數人都認不出來。(Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.)
author: 湯瑪斯·愛迪生 (Thomas A. Edison)

quote: 如果你想走得快，就獨自前行；如果你想走得遠，就結伴同行。(If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go together.)
author: 非洲諺語 (African Proverb) (之前在 tech-innovation 中也適用)

quote: 拖延是時間的竊賊。(Procrastination is the thief of time.)
author: 愛德華·楊 (Edward Young)

quote: 在工作中尋找樂趣，否則你可能找不到樂趣。(Find something you're passionate about and keep tremendously interested in it.)
author: 茱莉亞·查爾德 (Julia Child) (類似觀點，強調熱情)

quote: 不要害怕提出「愚蠢」的問題。它們往往是最難回答的問題。(Don't be afraid to ask 'stupid' questions. They are often the hardest ones to answer.)
author: 不詳 (鼓勵提問的文化)

quote: 成功人士與不成功人士的區別不在於力量或知識，而在於意志力。(The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack of will.)
author: 文斯·隆巴迪 (Vince Lombardi)
work: 美式足球教練的成功觀

quote: 最好的領導者是那些幾乎不為人所知的人。當他們的工作完成，目標實現時，人們會說：『這是我們自己做的。』(A leader is best when people barely know he exists, when his work is done, his aim fulfilled, they will say: we did it ourselves.)
author: 老子 (Lao Tzu)

quote: 保持忙碌並不等同於富有成效。(Being busy does not always mean real work.)
author: 湯瑪斯·愛迪生 (Thomas A. Edison) (類似觀點)

quote: 永遠準時。這不僅是尊重他人時間的表現，也是你專業素養的體現。(Always be on time. It's a sign of respect for other people's time and a reflection of your professionalism.)
author: 不詳 (職場基本禮儀)

quote: 不要害怕尋求幫助。承認自己不知道某事是智慧的開始。(Don't be afraid to ask for help. Admitting you don't know something is the beginning of wisdom.)
author: 不詳 (鼓勵合作與學習)

quote: 你的態度，而不是你的才能，將決定你的高度。(Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.)
author: 吉格·金克拉 (Zig Ziglar)

quote: 在重要的事情上，保持一致；在次要的事情上，保持彈性；在所有事情上，保持仁慈。(In essential things, unity; in non-essential things, liberty; in all things, charity.)
author: 奧古斯丁 (Augustine) (常被引用於團隊合作)

quote: 花時間磨利你的斧頭。(Take time to sharpen the axe.)
author: 亞伯拉罕·林肯 (Abraham Lincoln) (比喻)
tags: 工欲善其事必先利其器

quote: 專業人士是即使在不想做的時候也能把工作做好的人。(A professional is someone who can do his best work when he doesn't feel like it.)
author: 阿利斯泰爾·庫克 (Alistair Cooke)

quote: 不要只是努力工作，更要聰明地工作。(Don't just work hard, work smart.)
author: 不詳 (常見的工作方法論)

quote: 會議是工作的墳墓。(Meetings are the graveyard of work.)
author: 不詳 (對低效會議的諷刺)

quote: 建立人脈不是關於你認識誰，而是關於誰認識你，以及他們如何評價你。(Networking is not about who you know, it's about who knows you and how they perceive you.)
author: 不詳 (人脈經營觀點)

quote: 對你的工作抱持熱情，但不要讓工作定義你的全部。(Be passionate about your work, but don't let it define your entire identity.)
author: 不詳 (工作與生活平衡的建議)

quote: 在爭論中，獲勝的最佳方式是避免爭論。(The best way to win an argument is to avoid it.)
author: 戴爾·卡內基 (Dale Carnegie) (類似觀點)

quote: 你的職業生涯是一場馬拉松，而不是短跑。保持你的節奏。(Your career is a marathon, not a sprint. Pace yourself.)
author: 不詳 (長期職業發展觀)

quote: 學會說『不』，這能讓你專注於真正重要的事情。(Learn to say 'no'. It will free you up to focus on the things that truly matter.)
author: 史蒂夫·賈伯斯 (Steve Jobs) (常強調專注和拒絕)

quote: 永遠不要停止學習，因為生活永遠不會停止教導。(Never stop learning, because life never stops teaching.)
author: 不詳 (終身學習的理念)
